configuration.name: Auto openzwave lib path detection
configuration.description: Set to True for openzwave configuration path auto detection, else use configpath. [default : True]

configuration.name: Openzwave Configuration Path
configuration.description: Path for openzwave files configuration (see your openzwave installation).

configuration.name: Send complet message
configuration.description: Message complet confirmation send as notification (see doc to use it at True). [default : false]

configuration.name: Enable openzwave log
configuration.description: Active openzwave log (see file OZW_Log.txt in User path). WARNING file not in rotate mode, file should beging ernormous ! [default : false]

configuration.name: Web sockeckt server port
configuration.description: Network port for WebSocket plugin server. [default : 40470]

parameters.description: Zwave network name to replace Home ID for easier of nodes addressing. [e.g. : MyHomeId]
Zwave network name if refered in controller node or Openzwave Home ID)

switch.power.energy.prev.meter.description: Switch with power, energy meter (and previous value)
switch.power.energy.prev.meter.name: Switch

temp.humidity.relative.description: Temperature sensor with humidity and relative humidity
temp.humidity.relative.name: temperature sensor with humidity

Asupprimer.description: Switch with power meter, Everspring AN158,...
Asupprimer.name: Switch with power meter

Asupprimer.description: Multi control Dimmer (0% to 99%), Fibraro FGD211, ...
Asupprimer.name: Dimmer+

Asupprimer.description: Thermostat control with schedules, Danfoss living connect, ...
Asupprimer.name: Thermostat

Asupprimer.description: Alarm sensor like smoke, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, heat, flood ...
Asupprimer.name: Alarm sensor

identity.author: Nicolas VIGNAL
identity.description: Z-Wave is a wireless ecosystem that lets all your home electronics talk to each other, and to you, via remote control
identity.name: ozwave
